name: Tinker Tanks!
description:
Welcome to Tinker Tanks! You are a tank.

A plastic toy death machine shrunk down to fit in the palm of your hand. Rubber ducks and pincushions tower before you. Time to break stuff!

Blast your way through Level Mode, where over 33 destruction-filled levels await! Test your skill in Trial Mode, and survive 50 brutally designed arenas!
Fight with (or against) your friends in the chaotically crafted Battle Mode!
Relax in the Stage Builder, as you design your own Custom Battle Maps!

Unlock Powerups and Hats.
Modify your tank with these newfound abilities, and resume the destruction.
Unlock Endless Mode.
Survive in procedurally generated arenas that get more difficult the further you go.
Unlock the Custom Tank Creator.
Make your own Custom AI Tanks and place them in your Custom Battle Maps!

Engage in destructively fun top-down tank warfare! Try out the constructively fun battle arena building! Topple a monarchy. Upgrade your tank. Wear a silly hat. Wear a serious hat. Cooperate with your friends. Destroy your friends.

For you are a tank.

Tinker Tanks! features:
33+ Levels for 1-3 players.
50 handcrafted Trials for 1-2 players.
An infinite number of procedurally generated Trials for 1-2 players.
20 Battle Mode Maps for 1-4 players
The ability to make, share, and play on Custom Battle Maps!
The ability to make, share, and battle Custom AI Tanks!
A progression system, where your high scores become a currency that can unlock many things!
A myriad of options to improve performance, tweak controls, and change the flow of the Battles!
Mouse/Keyboard and X-box Controller support (each player will need their own controller)
